spec_data.Name: linux-libertine-fonts-common
spec_data.Description:
The Linux Libertine Open Fonts are a TrueType font family for practical
use in documents.  They were created to provide a free alternative to
proprietary standard fonts.

This package consists of files used by other linux-libertine-fonts packages.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Thu 27 Jul 2017 03:55:53 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Common files for Linux Libertine Open Fonts
